Description:
Detects execution of "msdt.exe" using an answer file which is simulating the legitimate way of calling msdt via "pcwrun.exe" (For example from the compatibility tab)

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Execute MSDT Via Answer File
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '% -af %' or command like '% /af %') and (process_path like '%\msdt.exe' and command like '%\windows\diagnostics\index\pcwdiagnostic.xml%')) and  not parent_process_path like '%\pcwrun.exe')
